ChangeList.Description: Added the `monitorOnce` member to the **monitorMode** enumeration.
Added the `applyOnceAndMonitorContinuous` member to the **monitorMode** enumeration.
Added the `applyOnce` member to the **monitorMode** enumeration.
Added the `applyContinuous` member to the **monitorMode** enumeration.
Added the **monitorRunType** enumeration type.
Removed the `inactivatedBySystem` member from the **monitorStatus** enumeration.
Added the **inactivationReason** property to the [configurationMonitor](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationMonitor?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **lastModifiedBy** property to the [configurationMonitor](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationMonitor?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **runAsUTCMServicePrincipal** property to the [configurationMonitor](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationMonitor?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **driftsFixed** property to the [configurationMonitoringResult](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationMonitoringResult?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **runType** property to the [configurationMonitoringResult](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationMonitoringResult?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **baselineParameterType** enumeration type.
Added the **driftStatus** enumeration type.
Added the **monitorMode** enumeration type.
Added the **monitorRunStatus** enumeration type.
Added the **monitorStatus** enumeration type.
Added the **snapshotJobStatus** enumeration type.
Added the [baselineParameter](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/baselineParameter?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [baselineResource](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/baselineResource?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.

Added the [errorDetail](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/errorDetail?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [openComplexDictionaryType](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/openComplexDictionaryType?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the **configurationManagement** relationship to the [admin](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/admin?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the [configurationApplication](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationApplication?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods.
Added the [configurationBaseline](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationBaseline?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and an associated method.
Added the [configurationDrift](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationDrift?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods.
Added the [configurationManagement](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationManagement?view=graph-rest-beta) resource type.
Added the [configurationMonitor](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationMonitor?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods.
Added the [configurationMonitoringResult](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationMonitoringResult?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods.
Added the [configurationSnapshotJob](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationSnapshotJob?view=graph-rest-beta) resource and associated methods.

Added the [createSnapshot](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/configurationBaseline-createSnapshot?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [configurationBaseline](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/configurationBaseline?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **Org.OData.Capabilities.V1.FilterRestrictions**.
Added the **Org.OData.Capabilities.V1.SortRestrictions**.
